title: 1/2 Price Launch Rate KabaKaba Lux Villa Pererenan
summary:
‚ú® Luxury 2-Bedroom Villa with Private Pool & Epic Views | Canggu / Kaba Kaba ‚ú®

üå¥ HALF-PRICE LAUNCH RATE ‚Äì June to Dec 2025 üå¥

Welcome to your dream escape in Bali ‚Äì a brand-new designer villa located in the peaceful Kaba Kaba area, just 10‚Äì15 minutes from the trendy beaches, cafes, and nightlife of Canggu, Pererenan, and Seseh.

This luxurious 2-bedroom villa offers total privacy, modern style, and the best view in Bali ‚Äì all from your own private pool or deep soaking tub.

The space
‚úÖ Private pool with rice field & sunset views
‚úÖ Huge bathtub with floor-to-ceiling vistas
‚úÖ Fast 75 Mbps Wi-Fi ‚Äì perfect for remote work
‚úÖ Full air-conditioning throughout
‚úÖ Car & scooter parking on-site
‚úÖ Close to top gyms, beach clubs, and restaurants

üåü Enjoy a 15% discount on monthly stays!
Book now and take advantage of our limited-time launch pricing!

Guest access
Surfing is a top things to do in Canggu for all skill levels, from novices to seasoned surfers. The beaches, like Echo Beach and Batu Bolong, offer various wave conditions, while local surf schools provide lessons and gear rentals. Embracing the surf culture is essential to the Canggu experience, making surfing a must-try activity for every visitor.

Canggu‚Äôs Culinary Scene: A Feast for the Senses

Canggu‚Äôs culinary landscape spans traditional Indonesian eateries to trendy international restaurants. Each dining spot offers a unique flavor experience, from beachside seafood to vegan delights, reflecting the diversity and creativity of Bali‚Äôs food scene.
 
Beach Clubs: Luxurious Coastal Lounging

One of the top things to do in Canggu is to visit its stylish beach clubs. Known for their vibrant atmosphere, these clubs offer the perfect mix of relaxation and entertainment. With amenities like infinity pools, gourmet dining, and live DJ sets, they are ideal for a luxurious day by the ocean, providing a memorable experience for all visitors.

Boutique Shopping: Discover Local Treasures

Canggu‚Äôs shopping scene is a vibrant mix of local and designer boutiques, offering everything from fashionable clothing to unique home decor. These shops reflect Bali‚Äôs artistic spirit and are perfect for finding memorable souvenirs and trendy apparel.

Immerse in Art: Workshops and Galleries

Canggu‚Äôs art scene is rich and diverse, with street art, galleries, and workshops showcasing local talent. Visitors can participate in art classes like painting or jewelry making, offering a hands-on experience of Bali‚Äôs artistic traditions.

Wellness Retreats: Spas and Yoga Studios

One of the top things to do in Canggu is to indulge in its wellness offerings. The area is a haven for relaxation, with a range of spas and yoga studios providing indulgent treatments and rejuvenating classes. These wellness retreats offer a serene environment for self-care, making them a must-visit for those seeking tranquility in Bali.

Spectacular Sunsets: Nature‚Äôs Canvas

One of the top things to do in Canggu is to witness the breathtaking sunsets. The sky transforms into vibrant hues of reds and oranges, with prime spots like Canggu Beach offering perfect settings for an evening picnic or a beachside cocktail. This experience encapsulates the serene beauty of Bali, making it a must-see for visitors.

Canggu‚Äôs Nightlife: From Sundown to Sunrise

Canggu‚Äôs nightlife is a top things to do in Canggu, catering to various tastes with laid-back beach bars and lively nightclubs. Popular spots like Old Man‚Äôs and Finn‚Äôs Beach Club are known for their live music, DJ sets, and craft cocktails, offering vibrant night experiences that are integral to the 
Canggu lifestyle.

Unique Accommodations: Stay in Style with Balivillaco est. 2006

Other things to note
üìù Additional Notes:

A 15% monthly discount is automatically applied to all bookings of 28 nights or more.

For monthly bookings with the discounted rate, electricity is not included and is paid separately by guests via a simple token top-up system.

For standard short-term bookings, electricity is fully included‚Äîno extra charges.

üöß Please note (June 2025):
There are roadworks happening a few kilometers away from the villa. While they are not near the property, they may affect traffic flow depending on your route. As with many areas in Bali‚Äîespecially around Canggu‚Äîoccasional infrastructure works are expected. We have no control over this and cannot accept responsibility for any travel delays or inconvenience.

reviews.text: We were welcomed with a drink on arrival and given a clear explanation of the facilities. The villa was beautiful, and it was such a treat to have our own private pool. Everything was exactly as described. If you‚Äôre looking for a peaceful, quiet weekend getaway, this is the perfect spot

Very nice place to stay, especially when you are tired of the noise but don‚Äôt want to go far. The view is beautiful from all sides and you can‚Äôt even imagine the beautiful sunsets and sunrises from the windows of the house. Maximum friendly and active staff who are always there to help with anything you need. Stylish, clean, comfortable and as much as possible I advise everyone to stay here at least for a couple of days

Nice quiet villa in quiet location. 
Everything needed was attended to right away 
Villa was attended to with cleaning and fresh towels every day. 
Highly recommend :)
Set in the middle of rice fields, this homey accommodation was worth every penny. I had a perfect weekend getaway!

We stayed at this villa for a week and had a truly peaceful and relaxing experience. The rice field views and sound of crickets at night made it the perfect nature escape.
Before our arrival, I arranged a surprise flower decoration in the bathtub for my wife, and Komang made it happen beautifully‚Äîshe was so happy! It was a special touch that made the stay even more memorable.
The villa was clean and well cared for. The cleaning staff were friendly and efficient. They also helped us with laundry and renting a bike, which made everything smooth and easy. 
As expected in a natural setting, there were some bugs, but nothing out of the ordinary and not a bother at all.
If you‚Äôre looking for a quiet, private place to unwind, this villa is a great choice. We‚Äôd definitely stay here again and highly recommend it!
Great service and lovely dogs watching over the place.
nice quite place to relax - with everything needed, even a smart tv room.
Very beautiful and quiet, I will come back here and give references for those who will be on vacation on Bali Island. Thanks
Everything was great and more than expected. We will definitely have another visit
Thank you, this place is amazing.
